snippet: A nurse who fought efforts by Maine to quarantine her at home after she returned from treating Ebola patients in West Africa reached an agreement on Monday with the state that largely leaves her free to travel.
abstract: Kaci Hickox, nurse who fought efforts by Maine to quarantine her at home after she returned from treating Ebola patients in West Africa, reaches an agreement with the state that largely leaves her free to travel.
lead_paragraph: A nurse who fought efforts by Maine to quarantine her at home after she returned from treating Ebola patients in West Africa reached an agreement on Monday with the state that largely leaves her free to travel.

headline.main: Maine: Nurse Reaches Agreement on Travel
headline.print_headline: Maine: Nurse Reaches Agreement on Travel
